info.title: Passage Management API
info.description: Passage's management API to manage your Passage apps and users.

post.description: Create magic link for a user.

requestBody.description: Request to create a magic link

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of users to fetch per page (max=500)

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Unix timestamp to anchor pagination results (fetches events that were created before the timestamp)

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Comma separated list of <field>:<ASC/DESC> (example: order_by=id:DESC,created_at:ASC) **cannot order_by `identifier`

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: search users email OR phone (pagination prepended operators identifier=<val>, identifier=<ne:val>, identifier=<gt:val>, identifier=<lt:val>, identifier=<like:val>, identifier=<not_like:val>)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: search users id (pagination prepended operators id=<val>, id=<ne:val>, id=<gt:val>, id=<lt:val>, id=<like:val>, id=<not_like:val>)

parameters.name: login_count
parameters.description: search users login_count (pagination prepended operators login_count=<val>, login_count=<ne:val>, login_count=<gt:val>, login_count=<lt:val>)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: search users by status (pagination prepended operators status=<val>, status=<ne:val>, status=<gt:val>, status=<lt:val>, status=<like:val>, status=<not_like:val>) -- valid values: (active, inactive, pending)

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: search users created_at (pagination prepended operators created_at=<val>, created_at=<ne:val>, created_at=<gt:val>, created_at=<lt:val> -- valid timestamp in the format: 2006-01-02T15:04:05.000000Z required

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: search users updated_at (pagination prepended operators updated_at=<val>, updated_at=<ne:val>, updated_at=<gt:val>, updated_at=<lt:val> -- valid timestamp in the format: 2006-01-02T15:04:05.000000Z required

parameters.name: last_login_at
parameters.description: search users last_login_at (pagination prepended operators last_login_at=<val>, lat_login_at=<ne:val>, last_login_at=<gt:val>, last_login_at=<lt:val> -- valid timestamp in the format: 2006-01-02T15:04:05.000000Z required

post.description: Create user for an application. Must provide an email of phone number identifier.

patch.description: Activate a user. They will now be able to login.
Deactivate a user. Their account will still exist, but they will not be able to login.

delete.summary: Delete a device for a user
delete.description: Delete a device for a user.
Revokes all refresh tokens for a user

TtlDisplayUnit.description:
Deprecated Property. The preferred unit for displaying the TTL. This value is for display only.
* `s` - seconds
* `m` - minutes
* `h` - hours
* `d` - days

ttl.description: Maximum time (IN SECONDS) for the auth to expire.
Maximum time (IN SECONDS) for the auth to expire.

AuthMethods.description: Denotes what methods this app is allowed to use for authentication with configurations

passage_container_background_color.description:
Container background color in hex.
Default is `#ffffff` in light mode & `#383838` in dark mode.

passage_input_box_background_color.description:
Input box background color in hex.
Default is `#ffffff` in light mode & `#4b4b4b` in dark mode.

passage_header_text_color.description:
Header text color in hex.
Default is `#222222` in light mode & `#f3f3f3` in dark mode.

passage_body_text_color.description:
Body text color in hex.
Default is `#222222` in light mode & `#f3f3f3` in dark mode.

allowed_callback_urls.description: The valid URLs where users can be redirected after authentication.

allowed_logout_urls.description: The valid URLs where users can be redirected after logging out.

application_login_uri.description: A route within your application that redirects to the Authorization URL endpoint.

auth_fallback_method.description: Deprecated Property. Please refer to `auth_methods` to view settings for individual authentication methods.

auth_fallback_method_ttl.description: Deprecated Property. Please refer to `auth_methods` to view settings for individual authentication methods.

auto_theme_enabled.description: Deprecated Property. Please use `hosted_theme` to set hosted page theming instead.

hosted.description: whether or not the app's login page is hosted by Passage

hosted_subdomain.description: the subdomain of the app's hosted login page

hosted_theme.description: theme setting of the app's hosted login page

secret.description: can only be retrieved by an app admin

Nonce.description: the nonce to exchange for an authentication token

language.description: language of the email to send (optional)

external_id.description: The external ID of the user. Only set if the user was created in a Flex app.

created_before.description: time anchor (Unix timestamp) --> all users returned created before this timestamp

total_users.description: total number of users for a particular query

email.description: Email of the new user. Either this or `phone` is required; both may be provided.

phone.description: Phone number of the new user. Either this or `email` is required; both may be provided.

user_agent.description: The raw user agent value from the originating device

user_agent_display.description: A display-friendly version of the user agent

provider_id.description: The external ID of the Social Connection.

provider_identifier.description: The email of connected social user.

provider_id.description: The external ID of the Social Connection.

provider_identifier.description: The email of connected social user.

provider_id.description: The external ID of the Social Connection.

provider_identifier.description: The email of connected social user.

WebAuthnIcons.description:
Contains the light and dark SVG icons that represent the brand of those devices
Values can be null or base64 encoded SVG. Example of SVG output: 
data:image/svg+xml;base64,

created_at.description: The first time this webAuthn device was used to authenticate the user

cred_id.description: The CredID for this webAuthn device

friendly_name.description: The friendly name for the webAuthn device used to authenticate

id.description: The ID of the webAuthn device used for authentication

last_login_at.description: The last time this webAuthn device was used to authenticate the user

updated_at.description: The last time this webAuthn device was updated

usage_count.description: How many times this webAuthn device has been used to authenticate the user

external_id.description: The external ID of the user. Only set if the user was created in a Flex app.

webauthn_types.description: List of credential types that have been used for authentication

bearerAuth.description: An auth token can be acquired by authenticating to the passage application (app_id=passage) with the Authentication API.
